document_api_meta.title: Get Creator Applicable Sample Label
document_api_meta.env_desc: Check if a creator can apply for a sample of a specific product.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^^can_apply
response_param.desc: Creator can apply this application or not.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
Status to describe if the creator has already applied this product as a free sample.
- TO_APPLY: creator has not applied this product as a free sample.
- ONGOING: creator applied this product as a free sample while he/she has not finished sample fulfillment.
- COMPLETE: creator applied this product as a free sample and finished sample fulfillment.

response_param.name: ^^application_id
response_param.desc: Sample Application ID. only appear when the creator has already applied this product.

response_param.name: ^^reach_limit
response_param.desc: If the creator has reached the sample application upper limit.

response_param.name: ^^^^sale_property_value_ids
response_param.desc: The combination of SKU properties for this SKU.

response_param.name: ^^^^^id
response_param.desc: A SKU property identifier, short for "Stock Keeping Unit Property ID", is a specific identification code assigned to a particular property or characteristic of a SKU.(i.e: "100000" means "color")

response_param.name: ^^^^^value_id
response_param.desc:
The SKU property value identifier is an identification code related to the specific values of the properties of a Stock Keeping Unit (SKU).
When a SKU has certain properties like color, size, etc., each possible value for those properties has its own unique SKU property value identifier. For instance, if the property is "color" and the possible values are "red", "blue", "green", then "red" would have its own SKU property vvalue identifier, "blue" would have another one, and so on.

response_param.name: ^^^^unavailable_reason
response_param.desc:
The reason why the SKU is unavailable: 
- IS_PREORDER : this product is a preorder product which does not support free sample
- IS_GIFT: this product is a gift product which does not support free sample
- OUT_OF_STOCK: product sold out
- EXCEED_CB_PRICE_THRESHOLD: 
- ALREADY_APPLYED: creator has already applied this SKU.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to get details regarding your collaborations, including searching collaborations, tracking collaboration performance, receiving collaboration detaiIs and updates, and querying sample applications and related fulfillment details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to get your collaborations, including getting the collaboration, searching collaborations, tracking collaboration performance, receiving collaboration updates, and getting sample distribution.
